name: Guardian Lich
description:
You are an immortal lich that lives in a dungeon alongside your pet minotaur. A nearby king has sent his army of knights and wizards to plunder your cave. Though your minotaur has much more brute force than you do, it sadly lacks your gift of immortality. In order to defeat the horde, you need to keep it alive!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Left-click to attack
